short_summary: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the supply of quantity 7x Rubber Track System.
description: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the supply of quantity 7x Rubber Track System. The full description of the requirement can be found under Annex A "Statement of Requirement" in the Request for Prosposal (RFP).",
duration_in_months: These changes may be subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and/or World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
